_description: Dataset collection IDs and versions for all sensor x platform combinations. Run scripts/update_dataset_versions.py to check for updates.

aws.notes: ESA Sentinel-2 L2A via AWS Earth Search

cdse.notes: ESA Sentinel-2 L2A via Copernicus Data Space

planetary.notes: ESA Sentinel-2 L2A via Microsoft Planetary Computer

gee.notes: ESA Sentinel-2 L2A harmonized collection on GEE

earthdata.notes: Harmonized Landsat Sentinel-2 (HLS) S30 product. 30m, BRDF-adjusted.

aws.notes: USGS Landsat Collection 2 Level 2 via AWS Earth Search

planetary.notes: USGS Landsat Collection 2 Level 2 via Planetary Computer

gee.notes: USGS Landsat 9 Collection 2 Tier 1 Level 2 on GEE. L8 merged at query time.

earthdata.notes: Harmonized Landsat Sentinel-2 (HLS) L30 product. 30m COGs, BRDF-adjusted.

planetary.notes: MODIS MOD09A1 8-day composite. Daily MOD09GA not available on Planetary Computer.

gee.notes: MODIS MOD09GA daily surface reflectance on GEE

earthdata.notes: MODIS MOD09GA daily surface reflectance. HDF4 files with subdatasets.

gee.notes: VIIRS VNP09GA daily surface reflectance on GEE

earthdata.notes: VIIRS VNP09GA daily surface reflectance. HDF5 files with subdatasets.

gee.notes: Sentinel-3 OLCI Level 1 TOA radiance on GEE
